title: Simon Schama on the Romantics
itunes:title: Simon Schama on the Romantics
itunes:subtitle: Simon Schama explores the legacy of the 18th and 19th-century artistic movement on the modern world. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Ahead of his new BBC Two series The Romantics and Us, the renowned art historian and broadcaster Simon Schama explores the legacy of the 18th and 19th-century artistic movement on the modern world. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
